alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 12:10AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. John The Baptist, northern St. Charles and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 100 AM CDT... At 1209 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norco, or near Laplace, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hahnville, Avondale, Laplace, Metairie, Jefferson, Harahan, Westwego, Norco, Elmwood, Montz, Luling, River Ridge, Boutte, Ama, Destrehan, Waggaman, Taft, New Sarpy, St. Rose and Paradis. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 209 and 225. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 6. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist
